TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PixelFormats extends System.Object
public ref class PixelFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: 代表受支援像素格式的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of supported pixel formats.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Bgr101010 { get; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Bgr101010
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr101010 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr101010 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
是具有 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色和紅色) 都配置了 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Bgr24 { get; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Bgr24
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr24 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr24 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。
是具有 24 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色和紅色) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式會使用每個像素資料的 24 位元 (8[!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]每三個主要色彩藍、 綠和紅色)。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] for each of the three primary colors blue, green, and red). 這會轉譯為每個主要色彩，以提供每個映像最多 16 萬色 256 色。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 若要顯示映像、 監視器和控制器必須能夠顯示至少 32,000 色彩。To display images, the monitor and controller must be capable of displaying at least 32,000 colors. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色和紅色) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

每一個色頻 (藍色、綠色、紅色和 Alpha) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 取得黑白像素格式，這種格式會將每像素一個位元的資料顯示為黑色或白色。

span.span: Gets the black and white pixel format which displays one bit of data per pixel as either black or white.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Cmyk32 { get; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Cmyk32
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Cmyk32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Cmyk32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得 像素格式，其顯示 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]，其中每一個色頻 (青色、洋紅色、黃色和黑色) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] with each color channel (cyan, magenta, yellow, and black) allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks CMYK 色彩系統通常用於列印墨水的紙張。The CMYK color system is often used in printing inks for paper. 這種類型的色彩表示法是表單 cmyk （C %、 M %、 Y %，%k） C、 M、 Y 和 K 是色彩的青色、 洋紅、 黃色及黑色值的百分比值。This type of color representation is of the form cmyk (C%, M%, Y%, K%), where C, M, Y, and K are the percent values for the cyan, magenta, yellow, and black values of the color. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Default { get; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Default
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Default As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Default { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得最適合特定作業的像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format that is best suited for the particular operation.
The best suited for the particular operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就技術上而言不是像素格式，但而存取的方法的像素格式最適合的特定作業。 is technically not a pixel format but rather a way to access the pixel format best suited for a particular operation. 其中的特定像素格式並不重要的情況下使用此格式。This format is used for situations where the specific pixel format is not important. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays a 16 bits-per-pixel grayscale channel, allowing 65536 shades of gray.

summary.span: 這個格式的 Gamma 為 1.0。

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

Public Shared ReadOnly Property Indexed1 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Indexed1 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用 2 個色彩指定調色盤點陣圖的像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

value.span: 使用 2 個色彩指定調色盤點陣圖的像素格式。

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調色盤的映像使用色彩表決定影像的色彩使用方式。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 映像中的每個像素對應至資料表或調色盤中以特定色彩。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 每個色彩調色盤中的識別其索引編號或值，對應到其資料表中的位置。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 像素格式具有 2 個資料表中可用色彩。The pixel format has 2 colors available in the table. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 每個色頻都會先乘以 Alpha 值。

span.span: Each color channel is pre-multiplied by the alpha value.

summary.span: 取得 像素格式。

每一個色頻 (紅色、綠色和藍色) 都配置了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (red, green, and blue) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式會使用 24 位元的每個像素 （每三個主要色彩紅色、 綠色和藍色的每個像素 8 位元） 的資料。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 bits per pixel for each of the three primary colors red, green, and blue). 這會轉譯為每個主要色彩，以提供每個映像最多 16 萬色 256 色。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 影像是與相同映像，但 （紅色、 綠色和藍色） 色頻位於不同的順序。An image is the same as a image, but the color channels (red, green, and blue) are in a different order. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: Each channel (red, green, blue, and alpha) is allocated 16 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

summary.span: 這個格式的 Gamma 為 1.0。

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.
